# Deferred.Failure

**Type Alias**

The kind of errors this publisher might publish.

## Declaration

```swift
typealias Failure = DeferredPublisher.Failure
```

## Declaring supporting types

- **Deferred.Output**: The kind of values published by this publisher.

items.description: The kind of values published by this publisher.
items.name: Deferred.Output
